info.name: DeviantArt - V7 Style Profile Page
info.description: Give Profile Pages a V7 Look. Compatible with "Eclipse Exp+".  AKA N0NNAKED Profile Pages.
info.additionalInfo:
Work with all Theme and while Log Out
Remove Comment section under Post and Watch Button 
Compatible with "Eclipse Exp+"

UPDATE:
-Added Padding Attribute for the Body
-Removed padding at the Bottom
-Fixed Padding Bottom attribute to Gallery and Watcher Section
-Hiding Horizontal Slider and padding for Latest Deviations section
-Removed Light Background for Widgets like Custom Box, Comments, Deviation Spotlight
-Added Attribute to Box in Shop Tab
-Fixed Texts Color in Widget, now it wouldn't be an issue reading them when changing theme
-Removing Color Attribute to Comments Bubbles
-Fixed Code for Legacy Journal and added color for Interest Text, even for Log Out
-Relooked Comments section and Reply Button
